flawed_nl_solution:
The second student guessed 800 because 8 x 100 = <<800=800>>800
The third guessed 600 because 800 - 200 = <<800-200=600>>600
The total guesses of the first three is 15000 because 100 + 800 + 600 = <<100+800+600=15000>>15000
The average of the first three guesses is 5000 because 15000 / 3 = <<15000/3=5000>>5000
The fourth student guessed 5025 because 5000 + 25 = <<5000+25=5025>>5025
#### 5025

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1500, not 15000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
